sentence.text: The present study demonstrated that coronin 3 is significantly upregulated in clinical primary hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC) samples by reverse transcription‑quantitative polymerase chain reaction (RT‑qPCR) and immunohistochemical staining.
In conclusion, these results indicated that coronin3 is significantly dysregulated in HCC tumor tissues, and may exert its function via regulating G6PC3 expression.
